property_description:
Bermondsey Heights is a landmarkZone 2developmentready for a move this summer.

Just a5-minute train ride from London Bridge, the best that central London has to offer is within easy reach.

Ambitiousinclude a proposed new London Overground station 400 metres away, a new business district, restaurants, shops and sports facilities.

Reasons to invest at Bermondsey Heights

  1. Better value:Prices of homes in Bermondsey are, on average, 23% lower than the Greater London average*, despite having everything on its doorstep and great accessibility anywhere in London.
  2. Zone 2 living with a Zone 3 price tag: Average prices being asked per square foot at Bermondsey Heights are 21% lower than the Zone 2 average. With 77% of schemes currently on the market in Zone 2 asking more per square foot than Bermondsey Heights*.
  3. Transport links:Located just one stop from London Bridge, all of London's main business and cultural hubs are easily accessible from Bermondsey Heights.
  4. Regeneration: Bermondsey has already a well-established regeneration success story, where warehouses have been turned in flats, shops, offices, and restaurants. Further plans include the regeneration of New Bermondsey, which is set to transform Bermondsey Heights' immediate surroundings.
  5. Local amenities: Young residents are attracted to Bermondsey, a vibrant area with every type of leisure activity available. From fine dining and a vibrant nightlife, to high-end shopping and celebrated markets, Bermondsey has it all.
  6. Demographics: The area is expected to grow at a faster rate than London in the next decade, with a more young and vibrant population attracted to the area from lucrative and cutting edge sectors thanks to its proximity to the capital's commercial centres.
  7. Education:Along with plenty of Ofsted Outstanding and Good schools in the local area, Bermondsey's Zone 2 location puts London's renowned independent schools and world-leading higher education institutions within easy reach. 
  8. Resident facilities: Every apartment at Bermondsey Heights has its own balcony or wintergarden, from which to enjoy the spectacular views, while a concierge andPantreeservice, residents' lounge, roof terrace and communal gardens combine to deliver modern, city living at its best.

*Source: JLL Bermondsey Investor Guide, September 2024

The Regeneration Effect

Bermondsey Heights lies at the heart of the regeneration of South Bermondsey. An ambitious programme of investment is set to transform this under-utilised corner of south-east London into an exciting new destination, just moments from London's beating heart.

The New Bermondsey Regeneration at a glance:

  • 3,500 new homes
  • Proposed new London Overground station
  • 3 new bus routes, plus improved pedestrian & cycling infrastructure
  • 13 new public spaces
  • New restaurants, cafés & bars
  • Space for digital, health, childcare, sports & creative industries, delivering 1,250 new jobs
  • New state-of-the-art sports complex & arena

To find out more visitwww.newbermondsey.com
